title: Ep. 110: ‘Coachella,’ ‘The Golden Globes,’ and ‘Homeland’
description:
The Ringer’s Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald run through the newly revealed lineup for Coachella and pick their favorite non-headliners (2:05). They also preview the categories and nominees for this weekend's Golden Globes (12:10) and discuss the return of ‘Homeland’ (34:45).
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
